11号林说尽管你们游行，12号会议继续；

然后12号：


"Hong Kong's Legislative Council President Andrew Leung has rescheduled the body’s meeting “to a later time to be determined by him” as protesters blocked roads outside the building"



https://twitter.com/next_china/status/1138648095850344450

“立法院主席宣布推迟（二读辩论）会议，因为抗议者堵住了道路和立法院（金钟）。”

简单，有效，讽刺。
